EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / Shawndrell Lynch (1357590362.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Shawndrell Lynch (1357590362.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Shawndrell, Yes, it can be hard, especially landing that fist one. Do you do anything with proposal work (management, writing, editing, capture support, etc.?) If so, I have a good firm I could refer you to (who also happens to pay our fee)…let me know. Also, check out our “Independence Guide” by going here. <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide> It has some good tips for finding your first project. Best of luck finding your next contract! Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: shawndrell lynch [mailto:shawndrelll@gmail.com] Sent: Monday, January 07, 2013 2:00 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Shawndrell Lynch Hey Sara,
Still searching. Finding a good contract is harder than I thought. I'm working with a couple of recruiters now, but nothing has materialized yet.
Thanks, ShawndrellOn Sun, Jan 6, 2013 at 2:40 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello Shawndrell, As a courtesy I wanted to follow up with you to see how the contract search was going. Any update would be great,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028 <tel:%28703%29%20793-6028>f: 703-793-6070 <tel:703-793-6070>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC01NjEmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTU2MSZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNTkzNzEmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUxMzg5ODAmZW1haWxpZD1zaGF3bmRyZWxsbEBnbWFpbC5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTI2MjYxLTEwOTQ4MjItMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56%2BUpUaW0lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFgI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
